span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为 Url 中的代码和 HTTP、HTTPS 和 FTP 协议定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是 url 协议后面的 "//" 之间的字符串和以下 "/" (如果存在, 例如`www.fourthcoffee.com` , url `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm`中的)。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, `www.fourthcoffee.com` in the URL `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm`. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 URL 为`http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/`, 则该站点`www.fourthcoffee.com`为, `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000`而不是。If a given URL is `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/`, the site is `www.fourthcoffee.com`, not `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000`. 站点可以完全匹配, 或在点分隔符处使用通配符\*("") 前缀进行匹配。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如, 站点名称字符串`*.fourthcoffee.com`匹配`fourthcoffee.com`和`www.fourthcoffee.com`。For example, the site name string `*.fourthcoffee.com` matches `fourthcoffee.com` as well as `www.fourthcoffee.com`. 如果没有通配符, 则站点名称必须是精确匹配。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站点名称字符串\*将匹配任何站点, 但不会与没有站点证据的代码匹配。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始, 不使用标识权限。 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中, 即使调用程序集是完全受信任的, 对标识权限的要求仍有效。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说, 尽管调用程序集具有完全信任, 但如果程序集不满足要求的条件, 则标识权限的请求会失败。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中, 如果调用程序集具有完全信任, 则标识权限要求将无效。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这将确保所有权限的一致性, 从而不会将标识权限视为一种特殊情况。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 允许的声明的范围取决于所使用的 。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全特性声明的安全信息存储在属性目标的元数据中, 由系统在运行时进行访问。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全, 请使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅由安全系统调用, 而不是由应用程序代码调用。This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时, 特性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化格式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 元数据中的声明性安全数据是根据此方法返回的与此属性对应的权限创建的。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
